'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a {{lc:Key}} in {{poe2}}.

##  Description 

{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}

##  Acquisition 

{{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}}

## Usage

* Opens the [Difficulty](/mechanics/) 13 chest in Furrante's Study in [Balefire Beacon](/balefireBeacon/), containing minor loot and [A Letter from Director Castol](/aLetterFromDirectorCastol/). This is only available during [Honor Among Thieves](/honorAmongThieves/).
